name: Hue Shift
description:
In this game, you run through an endless corridor and you have to use your magic ability to change the color of your body to avoid the red and blue block put in your path by an evil wizard. 

You need to be the same color as the blocks to pass through them and in certain cases, be the opposite color to use them as platforms. Space to jump and click to switch colors.

Special thanks to NotEuclid for helping me with the art and a lot of the ideas and to Komiku for making the music (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/Captain_Glouglous_Incredible_Week_Soun...).

Can you take on the evil wizard's challenge?
